p: A receiver operating characteristic (ROC) curve was generated from the multivariate regression model, which yielded an area under the curve of 0.753 (95% CI, 0.687â€“0.819) ( Fig 2). Based on maximum sensitivity and specificity for the model, optimum probability cut-off point of 0.0446 was selected, which yielded sensitivity of 64.5% and specificity of 72.6%.
